alert.note: Alert for Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 11:52AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sweetwater County through 1215 PM MDT... At 1150 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manila, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds will create very choppy waters on Flaming Gorge Reservoir. Boaters should head for shore. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
